title: The Future of Web Developments
description: Exploring emerging trends and technologies shaping the future of web development.
author: Emma Thompson
content:
The web development landscape is constantly evolving. New tools, frameworks, and methodologies emerge regularly, changing how we build for the web.

Some exciting trends to watch:

- Web Assembly
- Edge Computing
- AI-powered Development
- No-code/Low-code Platforms
- Improved Performance APIs
